alert.note: Alert for Bamberg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 4:53PM EDT until April 05 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Bamberg County in central South Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sycamore, or 7 miles east of Allendale, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. Spotters reported strong rotation with this storm. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Rivers Bridge State Park around 500 PM EDT. Padgetts around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Ehrhardt. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
